name: Shrine
description: A sacred site of worship and reflection; adventurers might receive blessings, research lore, or clash with zealots.
atmosphere: The shrine has a peaceful, spiritual atmosphere with the scent of incense and the soft sound of prayers and offerings being made. The air carries the weight of divine presence and the essential nature of spiritual connection, while the atmosphere crackles with the energy of religious devotion and the mysteries of the divine that surround this sacred space.
